landing.heroSubtitle: Track ibadah daily, get accurate Sehri/Iftar and prayer times, read Quran, and stay consistent with reminders — in Bengali and English.
landing.whyDesc: Everything in one place: daily tracker, prayer times, Quran reader, reminders, and calendar sync.
landing.benefitsTitle: Experience the Benefits of Ramadan Planner
landing.benefitPrivacyDesc: Deen is committed to protecting your privacy and keeping your personal information secure.
landing.benefitNoAdsDesc: Deen is ad-free and will never show you any advertisements, ensuring a distraction-free experience.
landing.benefitFreeDesc: Deen is completely free to use, with no hidden fees or charges.
landing.featureTrackingDesc: Log salah, Quran recitation, daily deeds, and personal reflections in seconds.
landing.featurePrayerDesc: Get Sehri, Iftar, and all 5 prayer times for any city worldwide — powered by the AlAdhan API with Hanafi calculation.
landing.featureQuranDesc: Access all 114 Surahs with Arabic text and translations. Set daily recitation goals and track your progress through Ramadan.
landing.featureBooksDesc: Discover Islamic books and continue your learning journey with trusted readings and practical guidance.
landing.featureDuasDesc: Discover Duas from the Quran and share them with loved ones.
landing.featureTasbihDesc: Track dhikr with a simple digital counter and keep your daily istighfar and salawat goals.
landing.featureZakatDesc: Quickly estimate your zakat amount from savings and liabilities with a clear, simple calculator.
landing.featureGoalsDesc: Set personal targets — finish the Quran, give daily charity, pray Tahajjud every night. Track your streak and stay motivated.
landing.featureRemindersDesc: Never miss Sehri or Iftar. Get timely reminders for prayers, Quran reading, and your custom goals.
landing.featureQuizDesc: Take an Islamic quiz each day to test your knowledge and learn something meaningful about your faith.
landing.featureCalendarDesc: Sync Ramadan schedule with Google Calendar and Apple Calendar so you never miss a beat.
landing.featureTimetableDesc: View today's Sehri and Iftar times and the full month timetable for your city.
landing.featureBilingualDesc: Full support for Bengali (বাংলা) as the primary language, with English for expats. Switch anytime with one tap.
landing.featurePrivacyDesc: Your ibadah data is private. We use row-level security and never share your information.

zakat.step2: 2) Net zakatable = Total assets - Short-term debts
zakat.step3: 3) If net zakatable is above Nisab, Zakat due = Net x 2.5%
zakat.rule1: This is an estimate tool; consult a qualified scholar for personal rulings.
zakat.rule2: Zakat is generally due when wealth stays above Nisab for one lunar year (hawl).
zakat.rule3: Nisab value changes with gold/silver prices; set your local Nisab value accordingly.
zakat.rule4: Only zakatable assets and payable short-term debts should be entered.
